Dictionary of registered performance measures

Source: R/mlr_measures.R

Dictionary of registered performance measures

Usage

See Dictionary.

See also

Other Dictionary: Dictionary, mlr_learners, mlr_resamplings, mlr_tasks

Other Measure: Measure

Examples

mlr_measures$keys()
#> [1] "acc"          "auc"          "mmce"         "mse"          "time_both"   
#> [6] "time_predict" "time_train"  
as.data.table(mlr_measures)
#>              id task_type packages
#> 1:          acc   classif  Metrics
#> 2:          auc   classif  Metrics
#> 3:         mmce   classif  Metrics
#> 4:          mse      regr  Metrics
#> 5:    time_both      <NA>         
#> 6: time_predict      <NA>         
#> 7:   time_train      <NA>         
m = mlr_measures$get("mmce")
print(m)
#> <MeasureClassifMMCE>
#>   Inherits from: <MeasureClassif>
#>   Public:
#>     aggregate: function (rr) 
#>     calculate: function (e) 
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     id: mmce
#>     initialize: function (id = "mmce") 
#>     learner_properties: 
#>     minimize: TRUE
#>     packages: Metrics
#>     predict_type: response
#>     range: 0 1
#>     task_properties: 
#>     task_type: classif
